basic_information.scholarship_name: Dwight Adams Endowed Scholarship in Forensic Science
basic_information.scholarship_notes: Waiting on Endowment Agreement to put criteria in

description: Scholarship mission: To provide scholarships for Incoming Freshman or Transfer students pursuing a degree in Forensic Science. Eligibility Requirements This scholarship will be available to apply for during the Incoming Student scholarship period. Completed Application Entering Freshman and/or Transfer Students Minimum GPA 2.5 250 word essay on career goals and why pursuing a forensics degree Must be enrolled full-time

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
